Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Power that revolves around you. Streaming, chatting, and getting things done is way more fun when you find your perfect position. Flex, bend and flip from anywhere with a 360-degree hinge and long lasting battery life.

11th Generation Intel Core processor: Brings the perfect combination of features to make you unstoppable. Get things done fast with high performance, instant responsiveness and best-inclass connectivity

Effortlessly connected: Enjoy a smoother wireless experience with a Wi-Fi CERTIFIED 6 (2×2) and Bluetooth 5 combo–all your connections are solid, with up to 3x faster file transfer speeds than Wi-Fi 5

Product Description

Jerry & Maggie is a global distributor, developer, and manufacturer of Home Décor and Office Supplies.
We established on the strength of brand names and private label programs in 2011, we develop and craft unrivaled products that drive sales for years. Explore our site to understand and enjoy all we have to offer. There must be a product you like because our designers create our fascination in the heart of the art and love.

Composition of two main parts – the position and the distance between two parts can be adjusted and rotated to best fit your needs – a great decoration at home or office

Flat surface and sturdy construct – excellent craftsmanship process – perfect for placing office supplies, documents, books, and plants

Jerry & Maggie’s adjustable storage rack is great for storage, organize,and clean up your desktop and workstation. Made of natural wood which provide stability and security.

Adjustable and Style

Features 2 separate parts that can be arranged close together to create a small shelf rack, arranged further apart to create a longer shelf, or set together at any angle you choose to best fit your space and your style.

More space for table

You can have more space for your workstation. You can organize books, office supplies, and other stuff to clean up your desktop space in your ideal way.

Easy installation

The product is assembly required. The storage rack is easy to install and change the direction. You just need to move the parts and arrange the way you need.

Material of natural wood , definitely no pungent scent – non-toxic | green healthy life style | sturdy board
Composition of two main parts – the position and the distance between two parts can be adjusted and rotated to best fit your needs – a great decoration at home or office
Flat surface and sturdy construct – excellent craftsmanship process – perfect for placing office supplies, documents, books, and plants
Lightweight ( 6 lb ) and 5 units organizer easy to transport and carry – save space on your office desktop – provide more options to meet your style
Approximate Displayed Product Measurement (L*H*W): 16*15.8*6.8 inches

item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:27:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

YATOJUZI

In Life, You find us a special friend. This will be our great honor.

YATOJUZI is a brand about developing and designing healing crystals , leading the trend in Europe and America; We are dedicated to helping everyone who is stressed in modern society find peace and energy.

We adhere to the business philosophy of “Customer experience first” and the business principle of “Quality first, Integrity first”.We hope to bring customers a comfortable and enjoyable experience and add happiness and joy to their lives.

Source:

In the 21st century, there is a girl who often feels various pressures from work and life, She often felt lost and powerless, At this time she always wanted to hold on something. She hopes to get energy from it to support her. By a chance, she got a worry Stone made of healing crystal. From then on, whenever she felt stressed or sad, she would hold this crystal and rub it. She was surprised to find that her heart gradually calmed down.

The brand “YATOJUZI “was born.

She developed a strong interest in healing crystals, and began to study healing crystals and decided to recommend them to more people.

Crystals and Healing Stones

Healing Crystals

Healing Crystal for Meditation

The more often you program the crystal with this meditation the stronger it’s healing energy will be.

Healing Crystal to divine.

Since crystal divination connects you to your higher self, it can help stimulate your intuition.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.36 x 1.97 x 1.26 inches; 2.4 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 16, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ YATOJUZI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09XQR7HVJ

[Elephant Symbolize ]:Elephants are revered as a symbol of good luck, prosperity, destroyer of evil, remover of obstacles, as well as strength, power, wisdom, memory, vitality, and gentle soul in a mammoth body.
[Powerful Intellect]The presence of an elephant in your life, whether in real life, the media, or elsewhere, can be a sign of wisdom for you to solve a problem or overcome an obstacle that may be in front of you. While you may feel incredibly emotional about a particular situation, you have a rational mind and are able to make logical decisions.
[Amethyst]:This purple stone is said to be incredibly protective, healing, and purifying. It’s claimed it can help rid the mind of negative thoughts and bring forth humility, sincerity, and spiritual wisdom. It’s also said to help promote sobriety. Sleep is another claimed benefit of this stone, from supposedly aiding in insomnia relief to understanding dreams.
[ After service]: If you have any questions, please tell us , we shall solve for you asap.We hope that all customers who use our crystal can be healed and happy everyday.

Welcome to YATOJUZI！


2 Inch Natural Healing Crystal Stones Elephant Figurine Statue Hand Carved Gemstone Energy Balancing Luck Gifts Collection Decor for Home Office Desk

Introduction to Elephants

Cute Elephants

  • Elephants are the largest existing land animals.
  • Distinctive features of elephants include a long proboscis called a trunk, tusks, large ear flaps, pillar-like legs, and tough but sensitive skin.

Elephant lifestyle

  • Elephants have a fission–fusion society, in which multiple family groups come together to socialise. .
  • Males leave their family groups when they reach puberty and may live alone or with other males.

What do elephants symbolize?

Elephants are revered as a symbol of good luck, prosperity, destroyer of evil, remover of obstacles, as well as strength, power, wisdom, memory, vitality, and gentle soul in a mammoth body.

Suitable Occasion

Pocket Stone

2 inch suite be a pocket stone, perfect size in your palm and easy to carry for pocket or handbag to bring you peace, fortune and positive energy.

Gift Idea

This is a perfect gift all you love, a wonderful Christmas gifts, birthday gift, Housewarming gift for you, your families and your friends.

Desk Decor

Place it on your office desk can attract the positive energy to improve your wealth and lucky in your daily work.

Touching

An elephant symbolizes the ability to draw money from outside.Touching an elephant's trunk can bring money to your life or business.

Different materials have different benefits!!

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

View more, carry less: See more of your screen on the 14 inch micro-edge bezel display. A thin and light design makes it easy to take this PC anywhere. Dependable performance: Tackle your busiest days with the performance of an AMD processor. Save more of what you love with plenty of storage for all your photos, videos and documents. Stay connected: Long-lasting battery life and HP Fast Charge technology lets you work, watch, and stay connected all day. Integrated precision touchpad with multi-touch support speeds up navigation and productivity.
Operating system: Windows 11 Home in S mode Experience the most secure Windows ever built with fast boot times, increased responsiveness, and added protection against phishing and malware.
Display: 14.0-inch diagonal, HD (1366 x 768), micro-edge, BrightView Enjoy your entertainment with the great quality and highdefinition detail of 1 million pixels
Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3250U Fast multitasking responsiveness, stunning visuals, and long-lasting battery life.
Memory: 8 GB DDR4-2400 MHz RAM (2 x 4 GB) Substantial high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run your games and photo- and video-editing applications, as well as multiple programs and browser tabs all at once.
Internal storage: 128 GB SATA 3 M.2 SSD Boot up in seconds, transfer files without waiting hours, and enjoy a snappier experience every time you use your PC
